name: absence
descriptionShort: Email template about absence to employees at work
descriptionLong: Allows to define in which days the employee was absent and exactly for what reason. Considering the hours of the week or month. Clearly shows the report of each week on the specific hours of work  the employee with own photo.

name: activities
descriptionShort: Email template related to the activities
descriptionLong: Allows to define the time with the kilometers spent on the activity at the given time. It shows the exact distance traveled and the number of people who "like it". In addition, the template allows you to add photos and shows the weather during activity.

name: blog-post
descriptionShort: Email template about posted blog posts
descriptionLong: Allows to create an e-mail about new posts that just appeared on the blog. Shows a part of  content along with a photo and title. Refers to the entire text or other posts posted on the blog.

name: collection
descriptionShort: Email template about the proposition of the collection
descriptionLong: Shows preferred themed blogs to follow. The template shows the five best blogs along with their short description with a photo, link to the subscription and the author of the text. Also shows another collections for scroll contents.

name: conference
descriptionShort: Email template with an invitation to a conference
descriptionLong: Allows to include a short description of the conference along with the topics discussed during the event. Describes who will run the conferences and for what reason. Also shows the time of start the conference and direct registration button on the website.

name: confirmation
descriptionShort: Email template with the booking confirmation
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email with all  important information about the reservation. Shows important details about sales. Confirms the reservation and shows the amount paid along with the date of purchase and definite place.

name: download
descriptionShort: Email template with message about the completed download
descriptionLong: Shows which link is ready to download items. Confirms the number of attachments downloaded along with its size.Shows how many times you can click on a definite file and the time of expiry.

name: error
descriptionShort: Email template with informaton about the error
descriptionLong: Allows to reduce the number of errors in the software. Describes the problem that related with the HTML code. Automatically sends to debug your content. Identifies the cause of the failure and allows to the remove. Shows the date of error.

name: event-invitation
descriptionShort: Email template with an invitation to a event
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email showing a new user group. Informs about the just formed group with short description and support to join in. It shows people who have already joined and automatically sends you to registration.

name: featured-photo
descriptionShort: Email template with the featured photo
descriptionLong: Allows to show the most popular photograph with the author and the date of publication from a given month. Shows the number of people who liked the photo. In addition shows following pictures, which may also be liked.

name: features-2
descriptionShort: Email template with new features
descriptionLong: Allows  to display the latest added features with a description and picture. Shortly describes each of new features and presents how to use it. Shows only the selected new functions, and sends to the rest of them by the button.

name: features
descriptionShort: Email template for the features
descriptionLong: Allows to popularize a new software feature. It presents in detail what is involved with the HTML code. Shows simple and quick modifications. Offers a trial version, just press the button. Each description is with a picture.

name: friend-request
descriptionShort: Email template for a friend request
descriptionLong: Allows to send a separate invitation to friends. Email show the photo of the person who sends the invitation along with the name. You can accept or refuse the invitation any time. Below it is information from which platform the invitation came from.

name: gdpr
descriptionShort: Email template about GDPR
descriptionLong: Shows an email template which is adapted to changes in user data. It protects individual, personal data, privacy the free flow of content. Include content about the elementary legal conditions of users.

name: help
descriptionShort: Email template with help to users
descriptionLong: Allows specify the occurs problem with a quick solution. Presents the most popular questions related to the theme of the problem and answers. Additionally, automatically moves to live chat  to find a solution.

name: invitation
descriptionShort: Email template with an invitation to collaborate
descriptionLong: Shows whos and for what purpose invites to cooperate.Viev the entire invitation by clicking on the button or visiting the profile of the person who invites you to learn a little more about them. In addition accept or reject the invitation any time.

name: invoice
descriptionShort: Email template with an invoice
descriptionLong: Shows the exact details of the payer with the purchased items on the pictures. Shows the amount of purchased goods including tax and the final amount. Shows the date of purchase and a direct button to print the invoice or contact with the company.

name: last-conversation
descriptionShort: Email template with the last conversation
descriptionLong: Allows to view the last conversation with the selected person. It presents a fragment of the conversation. To read all conversation click on the button 'read more'. Instead of names of users, shows a photo of them.

name: license
descriptionShort: Email template related with the license
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email related to the acquired license by the user. There is the name of the purchased service, the registration code to  activated and the details of the license, always with date expiration at the end.

name: message
descriptionShort: Email template with a new message
descriptionLong: Allows for quick response, informing that the user has responded to our message. Shows from who the message comes from and shows the written content. Below are the buttons for direct response or for managing reservations

name: missing-order
descriptionShort: Email template with the missing order
descriptionLong: Shows the shopping list in the basket. Sends products along with photos that were in the basket and expect realization. Offers an additional discount when transaction will complete. Also sends back by the button to continue the order.

name: newsletter
descriptionShort: Email template showing the newsletter
descriptionLong: Shows the latest information, messages in blog posts on thematic blogs or social networks. It presents articles that may interested the user. Clicking by on 'read more', the button moves to the whole text to the read.

name: offer
descriptionShort: Email template with promocional offer
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email witht the discount on product. It presents an interesting offer for users, which saves money. There is a description of what the offer is about, along with the expiry date of the offer. Sends by a button to get a discount.

name: order
descriptionShort: Email template with order summary
descriptionLong: Shows the order with the purchased products. Displays the order number along with the necessary information and the total cost and date of purchase. Underneath shows the proposed items and 'back to shop' button to buy something else.

name: password
descriptionShort: Email template with reset password for the account
descriptionLong: Allows to send a generated message with instructions to change the password when you forget it. Using the button, we move to the page to give a new password. Below there is a URL adress where you can find more information about changing the password.

name: payment
descriptionShort: Email template with payment details
descriptionLong: Shows an email template with the exact cost of the transaction along with information about the date, method of payment and invoice confirmation. An additional option is add a loan function from the  minimum amount.

name: popular-posts
descriptionShort: Email template with popular post
descriptionLong: Shows in the email the most viewed posts by users with the beginning of the text from the blog with the picture. Below are the next popular posts with the referring button to read more articles on thematic blogs.

name: pricing
descriptionShort: Email template with the given pricing
descriptionLong: Shows price offers along with attractive discounts between different packages. Each package contains various options and a different price. Each package satisfies different user needs. Through the "update" button moves to purchase the offer.

name: product-available
descriptionShort: Email template with an available product
descriptionLong: Allows to send an offer that was not currently available. Shows a specific product with photo and price. Use the button to refer to the website to purchase the product. Below are products that may also interest the recipient.

name: progress
descriptionShort: Email template with progress
descriptionLong: Shows the overall progress of the user at a given time related to the activity. Thanks to the graph, clearly describes the progress. Defines the day on which the activity took place along with the necessary information about it.

name: projects
descriptionShort: Email template with a project overview
descriptionLong: Allows to show employees' projects. Shows with the graph the percentage of the completed project along with a description of what it concerns and the person who coordinates the project. Using the button, it refers to managing all projects

name: promo-code
descriptionShort: Email template associated with promo code.
descriptionLong: Shows specially generated code for users to take uses of the promotion. Specifies the type and amount of the discount and its expiration date. It sends directly to the store to buy a product at a lower price than at the beginning.

name: register
descriptionShort: Email template about the registration of a new user
descriptionLong: Allows to confirm your data and complete registration of a new user in the system. It presents what the registration is about, along with the "confirm your email address" button. At the end is display thanks for registration

name: reminder
descriptionShort: Email template with an event reminder
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email referring to the private calendar. Sends notification of upcoming events with the date and place of the meeting. In addition, below are details of what the meeting is about, along with button to confirm your arrival.

name: repo-stats
descriptionShort: Email template about REPO review
descriptionLong: Shows financial transactions that regulate the liquidity of the banking sector. Presents a statistics graph and also open and closed problems together with new. Through photos  shows current management intermediaries

name: sale
descriptionShort: Email template for sales
descriptionLong: Shows ready text with photo in which it informs about the promotion. Offers a specific discount percentage along with a time limit. In addition, it refers directly to the purchase of the offer. Indicates which time the promotion is active.

name: schedule
descriptionShort: Email template connected with the schedule
descriptionLong: Allows to organize time at work with accurate employee data. Shows the status of the employee along with the time worked on a particular day. Employees are represented by a photo with the profession they perform.

name: shipped
descriptionShort: Email template informing about the shipment
descriptionLong: Allows to create an email which all the inportant details of the purchase. Email informs you that the product has been sent. Contains the tracking number of the shipment and the name of the company through which the product was sent.

name: stats-2
descriptionShort: Email template about statistics
descriptionLong: Shows company statistics on graph from a specific time with a specific system update that was entered. Shows the percentage of people who benefited from it, who were satisfied and those who rejected the update. Refers to full report.

name: stats
descriptionShort: Email template about statistics
descriptionLong: Allows on the graph to present statistics on website visits. Shows how many users have used the site at any given time. It divides users into those who have used the site and those who do not. It refers to the entire report by the button.

name: subscribe
descriptionShort: Email template about subscriptions
descriptionLong: Allows to send emails about proposed subscriptions. Every suggestion presents a short description of the application with logo. Next to each is a button that refers to the automatic subscription of the application. It also has a button to see more.

name: subscription
descriptionShort: Email template about confirmation of subscription
descriptionLong: Allows you to send an email about the request to accept the subscription. The message informs that thanks to the subscription the user will be up to date with new products. Refer by the button to subscribe.

name: survey
descriptionShort: Email template about survey
descriptionLong: Allows users to help improve the content. Sends a thank you for participating in the conference and asks for an opinion about it and an indication of whether they would recommend the content to friends. The scale is from 1 to 10.

name: todo
descriptionShort: Email template with a list of things to do
descriptionLong: Shows the monthly result of the to-do list. It contains the given activities showing which of them are you made with a specific date. Each action has a picture about the activity. It sends you with a button to set up, manage your to-do list

name: top-comments
descriptionShort: Email template with the top comments
descriptionLong: Shows the most relevant and best comments that relate to the company, product, brand. This template show comments along with the author of the text. The content is clear and transparent. In addition, there is a button below for see more comments.

name: ui-colors
descriptionShort: Email template with available colors
descriptionLong: Shows the available color palette in the table with codes. The colors are grouped into basic colors, social colors and variations of colors. A variety of colors allows everyone to choose something for themselves.

name: ui-grid
descriptionShort: Email template with a grid system
descriptionLong: Allows to create your own system, in which the grid is adapted. The width and length of the template depends on your preferences. Types of columns have been described with their number. The grid width adapts to the device on which it is run.

name: ui-typography
descriptionShort: Email template about typography
descriptionLong: Shows how the structures engaging the language in the tabler are shaped. Refers to the all typography. The template facilitates reading and writing in the system, not limited to one space. Additionally, shows the dimension of visual communication.

name: valentines-1
descriptionShort: Email template for Valentine's Day 1
descriptionLong: Template designed especially for Valentine's Day with donate a free year on the tabler. You can give it to every person. This is the best way to thank you that you are with us.The button automatically allows you to send a gift.

name: valentines-2
descriptionShort: Email template for Valentine's Day 2
descriptionLong: Template designed especially for Valentine's Day that saves 50% of the price. Automatically calculates the discount and shows the price after the discount. This is the best way to thank you that you are with us. The button sends you to buy a product.

name: valentines-3
descriptionShort: Email template for Valentine's Day 3
descriptionLong: Template designed especially for Valentine's Day with attractions lower by half price. Shows suggestions that can make Valentine's Day happy. This is the best way to thank you that you are with us.The button refers to buying or seeing more proposals.

name: valentines-4
descriptionShort: Email template for Valentine's Day 4
descriptionLong: Template designed especially for Valentine's Day with a voucher to be used in the tabler, along with the generated QR code for the given amount. This is the best way to thank you that you are with us.

name: visitors-map
descriptionShort: Email template related with the vistitor map
descriptionLong: Shows using graphics from which territory visitors arrived during one week. Shows the number of page views from a given region with precise statistics. Additionally, shows how many people are using the program and how many people closed account.

name: wishlist
descriptionShort: Email template with a wishlist update
descriptionLong: Allows display information about products that were not available before. It shows that the product that was in the basket is already completed in the magazine. Shows graphics with product and the amount. In addition sends a wish to the wishlist.
